name: FoodInsecurityDiagnosesSNOMEDCT
title: Food Insecurity Diagnoses SNOMED CT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>
The terms in this value set represent the diagnoses associated with food insecurity as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR implementation guide as well as other uses of these SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Nutrition impaired due to limited access to healthful foods (finding)
Mild food insecurity on United States household food security survey module (finding)
Moderate food insecurity on United States household food security survey module (finding)
Severe food insecurity on United States household food security survey module (finding)
